EmailTemplate.subject: Congrats! You are on your way to going solar with Palmetto!

Dear {!Contact.Name},
We are excited about helping you move forward with your decision to go solar! A local energy specialist will contact you soon to address any questions that you have.
A little bit about Palmetto Solar, we were established in 2009, we pride ourselves with our local experience, and dedicated customer service. We have a dedicated team of customer care specialists to help you address any questions that you have.
What you can look forward to when going solar!
Drastically reducing your energy bill Turning your monthly electric bill into an investment Having your neighbors look on in envy with your new investment
Palmetto Solar makes it easy to go solar with worry-free, no money down financing. If you are probably like most, you have a lot of questions about installing a solar power system, and we can’t wait to help answer your questions.
Kind regards, The Palmetto Team
